attributes.action: Establish a Cancer 'Czar' to conduct an urgent review of the state of cancer care in the UK, and end the post code lottery of drug availability.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The post would work across all health trusts and help to establish a national policy (similar to that in SCotland)that is fair and consistent. To engage with the pharmaceutical industry and consult with partners (ministers / officials / experts)throughout the EU and the world.
